item.title: “Something Every Christian Should Do”
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
Jesus went about DOING GOOD! Enjoy this special Faith the Facts with Jesse and be inspired to live every day like Jesus. Click here to watch the full message (https://jesseduplantisministries.subspla.sh/8kq4vpt).

  

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries
*Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jesseduplantisministries/
*Twitter: http://twitter.com/jesse_duplantis   *Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/jesseduplantismin

For more information, visit www.jdm.org

Ways to Give: PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jdmgiving
Website: https://www.jdm.org/donate

*TotalJDM: https://total.jdm.org/

There’s no room in the heart for God and the devil. In this episode, Jesse goes through the scriptures to show how someone who is saved can’t be demon possessed.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

*Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/JesseDuplantisMinistries

item.title: They Don’t Have To Like You, They Just Need To Love Jesus!
item.dc:creator: Jesse Duplantis
item.description:
There is no need to be a people pleaser! We all want to be liked, but Jesse shows how not everyone is going to like you. They don’t have to—they just need to love Jesus. So don’t let your heart be troubled and shine your light for the Lord!
